Articles.Content:
I have made a spreadsheet file with which you can calculate several things:

  • Phase angles for interplanetary travel
  • Delta V for orbit change
  • Travel time for interplanetary travel
  • Dark & Light time around planet
  • Orbital period
  • Orbital speed
  • Orbital Cicrumference
  • Minimum height satellite for full view planet with kerbnet max FOV

I made the file so you can calculate all the values you want to know from one place. This is why I plan to add more 'calculators' to the file over time. If you encounter any errors or you have some suggestions please leave them down below.

Here is a link to the google spreadsheet:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lcW55QIDpP2PCSfn3zUTG0c0j2YVQngLyq0owX-Ly2k/edit?usp=sharing

 

Edited March 24, 2023 by Saab
